Html:
Hello
I am trying to draw a curved line series graph. The line series data has to be retrieved from back end. I am using WPF environment with .Net Framework 4.5 with the support of System.Windows.Controls.DataVisualization.Charting.
Here my major issue is that
.DataVisualization.Charting is supporting LineSeries chart.
  1. Is there any way to set a property for making it as curved lines using Setter Property?
  2. is there any way to plot the data in realtime cured line using DataVisualization.Charting?
Thanks in advance.

Did you get any answer ? do you have a solution for your problem ?
Thanks.
